text: 9.8 Gal 4.23 Takaw agak anɨb ak, jɨj ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Eblaham ñapay ne tɨkek tɨkel amnɨgab okok, kɨli God ñapay ne mɨdebal agɨl gos ma nɨgɨnɨgun. Mel. God pen Eblaham nop tap olap gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglek, Eblaham ñɨ anɨb ak tɨkek tɨkel amnɨgab okok, kɨli nep Eblaham ñapay ne yɨbɨl mɨdebal agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨgun.
